original: intros l x. unfold lmax. split. - revert x. induction l as [|y l' IHl]. + intros x _. apply Forall_nil. + intros x H. apply Forall_cons. * apply Nat.le_max_l. * apply IHl. apply Nat.le_max_r in H. apply H. - intros H. induction l as [|y l' IHl]. + simpl. apply Nat.le_0_l. + simpl. apply Forall_inv in H as [H1 H2]. apply Nat.max_le_iff in H1 as [H1 H2]. apply IHl in H2. apply Nat.le_max_iff. auto.
